item.title: CVE-2024-37554|2024-07-06T16:12:55.519Z -- codeastrology%20team -- ultraaddons%20elementor%20lite%20%28header%20%26%20footer%20builder%2C%20menu%20builder%2C%20cart%20icon%2C%20shortcode%29
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CodeAstrology Team UltraAddons Elementor Lite (Header & Footer Builder, Menu Builder, Cart Icon, Shortcode).This issue affects UltraAddons Elementor Lite (Header & Footer Builder, Menu Builder, Cart Icon, Shortcode): from n/a through 1.1.6.
